definition: to tremble/to shiver/to shake/to vibrate/Taiwan pr. [zhan4]
to tremble/to shake out/to reveal/to make it in the world

sentences.chinese: 博恩斯教授還在不停的顫抖。

sentences.english: In other places it seems he enjoyed the slight tremble and wander of his hand.
sentences.chinese: 而在其他地方，他似乎挺滿意手上輕微的顫抖和晃動。

sentences.english: Nor was his head trembling and shaking.
sentences.chinese: 他的頭也不再顫抖搖晃了。

sentences.english: Her whole body quavered when she heard the sad news.
sentences.chinese: 她聽到那悲慘的消息後渾身顫抖。

sentences.english: I shiver a little, with the evening.
sentences.chinese: 這個夜晚讓我有些顫抖。

sentences.english: My heart is stone and still it trembles.
sentences.chinese: 我本心如鐵石，卻不由顫抖。
他氣得說話的聲音都顫抖了。

sentences.english: At first she shivered from her fear but at last she could vanquish it.
sentences.chinese: 起初她因害怕而顫抖，但最後終於能克服它。

sentences.english: Whenever a cold wind blows in, they tremble and chatter their branches.
sentences.chinese: 每當寒風吹起，它們就顫抖起來，枝葉直打戰。

sentences.english: She lookeddown at her Viennese fan of eagle feathers, and he sawthat her lips trembled.
sentences.chinese: 她低頭看着那把羽毛扇，他發現她的雙脣在顫抖。
戴安娜輕輕顫抖了一下。

sentences.english: We're taught to spend our entire lives cowering in self-denial.
sentences.chinese: 我們被教學要在自我否認中顫抖着過完一生。

sentences.english: What he pacified continuously taps she shivers of spine.
sentences.chinese: 他安撫的不斷輕拍着她顫抖的背脊。

sentences.english: What type of creature makes even the mighty Chewbacca tremble?
sentences.chinese: 什麼樣的生物能使強大的丘巴卡顫抖？

sentences.english: She quavered out her bitter experience.
sentences.chinese: 她以顫抖的聲音講述她悲慘的遭遇。

definition: to tremble/to shiver/to shake/to vibrate/Taiwan pr. [zhan4]
to throb/to pulse/to bounce/to jiggle/to jump about
to move emotionally/to stir up (emotions)/to excite
to feel/to sense/to detect/to perceive/to become aware
